_comment: Complete configuration example with all options and their defaults
_usage: Copy to config.json and modify. Only 'auth.email' and 'auth.password' are required.

api._comment: API settings - ALL OPTIONAL with these defaults
api.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) obsidian/1.8.10 Chrome/132.0.6834.196 Electron/34.2.0 Safari/537.36

auth._combined_credentials_file: REQUIRED - Path to JSON file with auth and vault passwords
auth._token_file: DEFAULT: .obsync/auth/token.json - Where to cache auth token
auth._note: See credentials.example.json for the required credentials file format

storage._comment: Storage paths - ALL OPTIONAL with these defaults
storage._data_dir: DEFAULT: .obsync - Base directory for all data
storage._max_file_size: DEFAULT: 104857600 (100MB) - Maximum file size to sync

sync._comment: Sync settings - ALL OPTIONAL with these defaults
sync._base_dir: DEFAULT: ./vaults - Where to store synced vaults
sync._validate_checksums: DEFAULT: true - Verify file integrity after download

log._comment: Logging - ALL OPTIONAL with these defaults
log._level: DEFAULT: info - Options: debug, info, warn, error
log._file: DEFAULT: empty (console only) - Set path to enable file logging
log._max_size: DEFAULT: 10 - Max log file size in MB
log._max_backups: DEFAULT: 3 - Number of old log files to keep
log._max_age: DEFAULT: 7 - Days to keep old logs
log._timestamp: DEFAULT: true - Include timestamps in logs

dev._comment: Development options - ALL OPTIONAL, normally not needed
dev._save_websocket_trace: DEFAULT: false - Save WebSocket messages for debugging
dev._insecure_skip_verify: DEFAULT: false - Skip TLS certificate verification (DANGEROUS)
